trans-unit.source: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.
trans-unit.target: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.

trans-unit.source: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.

trans-unit.source: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the
trans-unit.target: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the

trans-unit.source: environment you are deploying to.
trans-unit.target: environment you are deploying to.

trans-unit.source: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.
trans-unit.target: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.

trans-unit.source: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deployed.
trans-unit.target: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deployed.

trans-unit.source: We will describe each parameter in the template.
trans-unit.target: We will describe each parameter in the template.

trans-unit.source: gatewayName
trans-unit.target: gatewayName

trans-unit.source: The name of the gateway.
trans-unit.target: The name of the gateway.

trans-unit.source: The API app gets registered to this gateway.
trans-unit.target: The API app gets registered to this gateway.

trans-unit.source: apiAppName
trans-unit.target: apiAppName

trans-unit.source: The name of the API app to create.
trans-unit.target: The name of the API app to create.

trans-unit.source: The name must contain at least 8 characters and no more than 50 characters.
trans-unit.target: The name must contain at least 8 characters and no more than 50 characters.

trans-unit.source: apiAppSecret
trans-unit.target: apiAppSecret

trans-unit.source: The secret for the API app.
trans-unit.target: The secret for the API app.

trans-unit.source: This value must be a base64-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: This value must be a base64-encoded string.

trans-unit.source: It should be a random string with 64 characters, and consist of only integers and lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: It should be a random string with 64 characters, and consist of only integers and lowercase characters.

trans-unit.source: location
trans-unit.target: location

trans-unit.source: The location for the new API app.
trans-unit.target: The location for the new API app.

trans-unit.source: You can get valid locations by running the PowerShell command `Get-AzureLocation` or the Azure CLI command `azure location list`.
trans-unit.target: You can get valid locations by running the PowerShell command `Get-AzureLocation` or the Azure CLI command `azure location list`.
